name: Mr. Bipede
description:
Hold on tight! Swing your way through the levels as fast as possible. Don't touch anything red and look out for the shiny yellow stuff.

WARNING: This game is rated astronomically difficult, and you should only play it if you are mentally strong enough for the rage you might encounter. Oh and for those who want to use a super ergonomic controller because they are afraid to get RSI, too bad keyboard only. 

Good luck and happy raging!

- Pepijn Bakker, Hemisphere Studios -
